name: Snap-Fest!
description:
You play as a Camera protecting its precious film from being overexposed to light so you can develop the pictures you took! See if you can the beat Level 1 and Level 2! Controls are provided in game.

Developer: I was influenced by several photography games, Pokemon Snap being the biggest influence. The aesthetic I designed for this game comes from the Dark Room atmosphere that was used to develop photo negatives.
